frey.description: Frey & Freja's Aett. Symbolizes the creation of the universe and turning chaos into order. Generally represents material wealth, possessions, physical well-being and the basics of life.
frey.title: Creation

heimdall.description: Heimdall and Mordgudâ€™s Aett. Represents disruption and change. Focuses on challenges, transformations, and natural forces. The runes here often symbolize the trials one must go through for growth.
heimdall.title: Transformation

tyr.description: Tyr & Zisa's Aett. Represents ascension towards god and goddess-hood. Associated with higher concepts such as justice, honor, spiritual growth, leadership, self-sacrifice, and the pursuit of higher ideals.
tyr.title: Divinity

cardinal.description: Focused on creating, initiating action. Represents the start of a season.
cardinal.title: Cardinal

fixed.description: Focused on maintenance, continuity and control. Represents the middle of a season.
fixed.title: Fixed

house.description: A domain of an individualâ€™s life. For example, material possessions (2nd) and relationships (7th).
house.title: House

mutable.description: Focused on adapting, changing and transforming. Represents the end of a season.
mutable.title: Mutable

planet.description: An aspect or layer of an individualâ€™s psyche. For example, your feelings (moon) versus your intellect (mercury).
planet.title: Planet

zodiac.description: A quality, energy, characteristic, or style through which a person relates with the world.
zodiac.title: Zodiac

description: The inner child or explorer. Constantly learning, eager, open-minded and curious. They crave representations of their suit that they can grasp and feel.
The initiator or performer. Prioritizes action. Often feels the need to prove themselves, concerned with bringing suit's energy to world. Passionate but impatient.
Internally focused counterpart to the king. She embodies and masters the energy in her suit in her private world, and inspires others through her commitment to her suit's ideals.
An externally focused counterpart to the queen. Strategic execution of the powers of their suit in service of external change. A desire to mold the world according to ideals of their suit.

about.principle1:
The cards don't divine your fate. They empower you to shape your own.

We donâ€™t believe in divination. We are here to empower you, not the cards. The magic isn't in the cards, it's in you.
about.principle2:
Tarot is your mirror. It reflects the self.

It is a language whose vocabulary is comprised of our universal experiences, giving you the perspective to see your life in novel ways. Knowing and accepting yourself, your limitations and your biases, your strengths and weaknesses, empowers you to live in harmony with yourself and others.
about.principle3:
Magic happens when we align inner self with outer action.

Tarot's insight into your inner world provides the starting point for tackling the hard questions that make us who we are, and how to bring that into our everyday lives. It encourages you to craft a path that is uniquely yours.
about.principle4:
Connecting to yourself creates deeper empathy with the world.

Because we are all traveling the Foolâ€™s Journey, our common experiences form the foundation for meaningful relationships. When we read for others, we create the space to talk about the things that make us feel vulnerable, authentic and true; a sanctuary to honor and respect those deepest, most intimate parts of ourselves and each other.
about.title: About Us
about.website: More free tarot resources on our website
about.who_long:
Our headmistress started working with tarot since she was just a wee lass, but only came back to it later in her life. Labyrinthos started from her deciding to illustrate her own deck, the Golden Thread Tarot in 2016. She chose to scrap the instructional booklet, and replace it with an app. Because she is hopelessly stubborn and extremely bad at asking for help, she learned to build mobile apps by coding Golden Thread Tarot herself. At that time, she was still working in various companies as a product designer, where she sometimes used her lunch breaks to give readings.

Despite what it looks like, Labyrinthos is still run by this lone mysterious headmistress. She does all the illustrations for the decks and app, coding the majority of the app, writing all of our content and articles, social media, and customer service. And yes, she is really very tired all time. Phew.

Her husband Luis occasionally devotes weekends to helping her code the back end of this app, since unlike Tina, he is an actual engineer and not just a designer pretending to be an engineer. Yay! Thanks Luis!

The two of them live with their cat Mephisto and their plants in Queens, New York.

We have never gotten any outside investment, and don't plan on it. We're a proud mom and pop (and cat) shop! Keeping the app running isn't easy or free though, and we have to pay for data storage, upkeep and more that comes out of our household budget. If you enjoy this app, please consider supporting us by buying one of Tina's printed tarot decks or purchasing some Catssandra credits!

We hope you enjoy working with the tarot as much as we do.

astrology-oracle_house-01.png.description: This first house is related to our sense of identity. This house represents how we are seen by others. Everything that is related to appearance falls under the rulership of this house. This is not just in a physical sense, the first house does include our bodies, our clothes, but it also includes the manner in which we present ourselves into the world. What do you want others to know about you? How do you alter your behavior, your words, your attitude and your style to match that identity? How do you like to distinguish yourself from others?
astrology-oracle_house-01.png.title: House of Self

astrology-oracle_house-02.png.description: The second house is called the house of value, which is about possessions, money, material things, earnings and expenditures. It represents our financial lives - what we earn, what we spend, the things we care about. On a more psychological level, this house also rules one's feelings on ownership, as well as one's system of values, as well as our self worth. How do you deal with money and possessions? What do you value?
astrology-oracle_house-02.png.title: House of Value

astrology-oracle_house-03.png.description: The third house of a natal chart is traditionally ruled by the zodiac sign Gemini and its ruling planet Mercury. It is thought to be the house of intelligence - meaning that it rules all sensory information and how one processes that information. It rules over communication and speech as well. How do you process information? What is your mental life like? How do you learn and think?
astrology-oracle_house-03.png.title: House of Intellect

astrology-oracle_house-04.png.description: The fourth house rules everything that is related with one's history and roots. This includes the home, the family, and the ancestors. In this house, you'll find everything related to your family of origin, your home, the traditions learned in that home, what is passed from generation to generation. What was your childhood like? What patterns of thought did you learn? What was the foundation that you had to grow up in?
astrology-oracle_house-04.png.title: House of Origins

astrology-oracle_house-05.png.description: This house represents all pleasurable parts of our lives - things that we do because we love doing them. It rules over all that we find fun, enjoyable and exciting. It includes things that we do as hobbies and for entertainment. Creativity is also included here: it is the kind of creativity that comes from pure playfulness, not as a means to an end. What do you enjoy? What brings you happiness? What are the kinds of things you like to do for fun?
astrology-oracle_house-05.png.title: House of Play

astrology-oracle_house-06.png.description: The sixth house are all related to our obligations, the things that we need to take care of, our health, and our routines. It represents the things that we need to do, versus the things that we want to do (ruled by the fifth house). It includes our daily routines, the day to day tasks that we need to accomplish at home or at work, as well as our health. What is your health like? What do you need to do to make a living? What are your feelings to routine? What are your duties and responsibilities?
astrology-oracle_house-06.png.title: House of Service

astrology-oracle_house-07.png.description: This house rules over all long term, close relationships that we engage in throughout our lives. It can include our long term partners, our spouses, our business partners, and even our enemies. Anyone that has a close relationship to you can be included in this house. Who are you close with? How do you approach close relationships? Who is important in your life?
astrology-oracle_house-07.png.title: House of Partners

astrology-oracle_house-08.png.description: The house of transformation rules over some of the most intense changes in our lives. It includes death and the effects of death, sex, taboos, resurrection. Sex is the opposite of death, it is the beginning of life - another transformation. We can infer from these general fields that it also rules legacies, heritages, and wills. Likewise, the eighth house is one of the entryways towards the spiritual world and is generally associated with the occult and magic. What is your attitude to change, death rebirth and crisis?
astrology-oracle_house-08.png.title: House of Transformation

astrology-oracle_house-09.png.description: As it is situated close to the peak of the sky during one's birth, the ninth house is an open entryway for the soul towards the heavens. It is described as the house of spriritual journeys and greater wisdom. The house oversees most things that are related with growth, regardless of whether it is education, travel or the communicating thoughts. All philosophical research and understanding fall under the rulership of this ninth house. It doesnâ€™t matter if one is receiving education through a school or if one is simply expanding their mind alone, all learning and the knowledge that comes with it are matters of the ninth house.
astrology-oracle_house-09.png.title: House of Journeys

astrology-oracle_house-10.png.description: The cusp of the 10th house is called Midheaven (or MC, standing for Medium Coeli), which demonstrates the kind of profession that one takes after. For the most part, the tenth house is about one's career (versus their daily work routines in the sixth house), their ambitions, and how they appear to one's colleagues. An individual's standing and reputation in the public eye are to be seen here, as well as their accomplishments in their chosen field. What is our position in society? What are our ambitions?
astrology-oracle_house-10.png.title: House of Ambition

astrology-oracle_house-11.png.description: The eleventh house rules friends, group gatherings and any sort of associations one is a part of. This house centers around our relationship with our social circle, and how we are a part of larger social structures. It includes the groups and organizations that we are a part of. What are our friendships like and what are they based on?
astrology-oracle_house-11.png.title: House of Society

astrology-oracle_house-12.png.description: The 12th house is called the house of secrets, dreams, the hidden world and the unconscious. It is considered one of the most dangerous houses in the natal chart, rooted deeply in our psyche. But don't worry, by expanding your perspective, and healing our wounds, the dangers that this 12th house brings us can be softened. This house represents the processes and values that guide our thoughts and activities, our intuitions and instincts, and unconscious beliefs that drive us.
astrology-oracle_house-12.png.title: House of Secrets

astrology-oracle_moon-first-quarter.png.description: When the moon looks as if its cut in half, it signals that action is ready to be taken. Put your plans into motion. If we discover any obstacles that block our path, we must be steadfast and overcome them. Today, we will seek to uncover obstacles and challenges that lie in your path to reaching your goal, and possible solutions for you.
astrology-oracle_moon-first-quarter.png.title: First Quarter

astrology-oracle_moon-full.png.description: The full moon is also known as the harvest moon, and as the name suggests, it is a time to receive the gifts of your past intentions, and even of your current one - if you're lucky. From this period, the moon will go from waxing to waning, signaling our journey to look inward instead of out. It is a time to simply celebrate yourself, and be grateful.
astrology-oracle_moon-full.png.title: Full Moon

astrology-oracle_moon-last-quarter.png.description: After thinking carefully about your internal compass in the last phase, now it is time to release and let go of those habits and thought processes that hold you back. The last quarter moon asks you to forgive yourself and cleanse in preparation for the next phase.
astrology-oracle_moon-last-quarter.png.title: Last Quarter

astrology-oracle_moon-lunar-eclipse.png.description: Occur with full moons and are more powerful versions of the full moon. As such, it is a time when you will be harvesting intentions and changes from past months. If your actions have been aligned with your true self, you can be rewarded. They are moments of deep transformation and sudden change.
astrology-oracle_moon-lunar-eclipse.png.title: Lunar Eclipse

astrology-oracle_moon-new.png.description: When the moon is invisible, it signals that all has been cleared, and itâ€™s time to have a new beginning. Itâ€™s thought of as a good time to gather ideas, thoughts and plan ahead for the coming month or so. It is also here where we will begin a new cycle. At this time, you should think about what you would like to accomplish in this coming cycle, and why.
astrology-oracle_moon-new.png.title: New Moon

astrology-oracle_moon-solar-eclipse.png.description: Occur with new moons and are more powerful versions of the new moon. Solar eclipses give you powerful energy to start over with a clean slate.
astrology-oracle_moon-solar-eclipse.png.title: Solar Eclipse

astrology-oracle_moon-wane-cres.png.description: This is a time for recuperation. To be fully open to the next cycle, one must completely be relieved from this one. Try and clear your mind, wrap up all loose ends, and prepare for the next cycle of rebirth and regeneration.
astrology-oracle_moon-wane-cres.png.title: Waning Crescent

astrology-oracle_moon-wane-gibb.png.description: While your actions and their reactions are still clear in your memory, itâ€™s a good time to reflect. This stage, like its waxing mirror, is also one for refining, but this time, instead of looking at what we've done, look inward this time. Think about how you feel, your thought processes, and your assumptions, your perception of yourself - how has that impacted your actions?
astrology-oracle_moon-wane-gibb.png.title: Waning Gibbous

astrology-oracle_moon-wax-cres.png.description: Think about this time as planting a seed. The new moon gave you a chance to think about what it is that you want to accomplish, but the waxing crescent asks us to make it known, and develop our willpower to push it into fruition. Today, we will go over and develop a clearer picture of what that could look like, and plan your path to it.
astrology-oracle_moon-wax-cres.png.title: Waxing Crescent

astrology-oracle_moon-wax-gibb.png.description: The waxing gibbous moon is there when we are close to our goals, but we need to assess their viability. Perhaps your original desire is not possible at this time, but a different version of it is. We'll analyze any of the missteps that might have been taken, and consider what we can improve. Perhaps by changing the details, you can come closer to your goal.
astrology-oracle_moon-wax-gibb.png.title: Waxing Gibbous

astrology-oracle_planet-jupiter.png.description: The planet Jupiter represents our sense of optimism, of hope and growth. It shows us how a person finds happiness and purpose, as well as where in life they might be most lucky. What brings you luck and success? What gives you confidence? What makes your life fulfilling?
astrology-oracle_planet-jupiter.png.title: Jupiter

astrology-oracle_planet-mars.png.description: Mars represents the part of us that is still animalistic - our aggression, our sense of competition, and drive. Mars tells us how a person is driven to take action, and what makes them passionate. What gives you passion, courage and drive? What makes you angry? How do you express anger? What are your animal instincts like?
astrology-oracle_planet-mars.png.title: Mars

astrology-oracle_planet-mercury.png.description: The planet mercury symbolizes reason - and therefore also shows us how a person communicates, and the general structure of their thoughts and how they learn and absorb information. How do you express yourself? What first impressions do you make? How do you process ideas and information?
astrology-oracle_planet-mercury.png.title: Mercury

astrology-oracle_planet-moon.png.description: The moon represents the general depiction of ones feelings, what their instincts drive them to, and what moods are most common. What pushes your buttons? In what aspects of your life are you generally touchy? How do you deal with your emotions and how deep are they?
astrology-oracle_planet-moon.png.title: Moon

astrology-oracle_planet-neptune.png.description: The planet Neptune represents the more mystical side of our nature - our dreams, our intuition and imagination. This planet will show us a personâ€™s dreams as well as their delusions - and where they are most creative. What do you find spiritually fulfilling? Where are you most creative? Where is it easy for you to be confused and lost?
astrology-oracle_planet-neptune.png.title: Neptune

astrology-oracle_planet-pluto.png.description: The planet pluto symbolizes power and transcendence. It shows us how a person deals with power, as well as our ability to deal with rebirth - and the concept of death and rebirth. Where is it that you need to find deeper truth and meaning? Where in your life will be marked by upheaval, obsession, and paranoia?
astrology-oracle_planet-pluto.png.title: Pluto

astrology-oracle_planet-saturn.png.description: Saturn is the planet of restriction - of reality - where we begin to see our limitations. This planet tells us about a personâ€™s obstacles, but also where and how they can be disciplined, and where their greater responsibilities lie. What do you fear? What do you worry about? What restricts and limits you? What will you have trouble with?
astrology-oracle_planet-saturn.png.title: Saturn

astrology-oracle_planet-sun.png.description: The sun is known as the provider of life and energy. In astrology, this heavenly body represents the conscious mind and the ego. It is a symbol of our life force and our will to exist. What is the most exceptional light that you bring into the world? In what areas and approaches of life can you show the most brilliance? How do you express yourself?
astrology-oracle_planet-sun.png.title: Sun

astrology-oracle_planet-uranus.png.description: Uranus is the planet of sudden inspiration and change, of eccentricity and openness. In oneâ€™s natal chart, Uranus shows us where in life they may experience these kinds of sudden changes. What makes you special? What makes you different? Where in life are you most eccentric? Where do you want to create change?
astrology-oracle_planet-uranus.png.title: Uranus

astrology-oracle_planet-venus.png.description: The planet venus symbolizes our concepts of beauty, pleasure, and sociability. Someoneâ€™s venus sign shows us how what it is they find pleasurable and beautiful, and what they are attracted to, as well as their style of love. What sort of lovers do you draw to yourself? Do you tend to flirt? Do your relationships bring you happiness, or would you instead say you are frequently disillusioned? Where do your imaginative abilities lie?
astrology-oracle_planet-venus.png.title: Venus

astrology-oracle_zodiac-aquarius.png.description: Aquarius often comes off as an oddball - they have quirky personalities and quietly go about accomplishing their goals in quiet, and unorthodox ways. Oftentimes, just because Aquarius chooses to take the path less traveled, the results of their eccentric methods are surprisingly effective. They are the humanitarians of the zodiac, taking up banners for the greater good of humanity. Many of them are also easy going and their peculiarity alongside their curious nature make them fast friendships. Sometimes, if they don't strive to motivate themselves, they can succumb to laziness. Many are often gifted with a strong sense of art and poetry.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-aquarius.png.strengths: intelligent, inventive, humanistic, friendly, altruistic, sociable, and reformative
astrology-oracle_zodiac-aquarius.png.title: Aquarius
astrology-oracle_zodiac-aquarius.png.weaknesses: rebels without a cause, emotionally detached, scatterbrained, irresponsible and impersonal

astrology-oracle_zodiac-aries.png.description: Those born under the Aries zodiac sign often have an exciting and enthusiastic energy. They often seek new and challenging adventures that can push their limits. They are driven, ambitious and curious, and Aries tends to have a strong sense of justice. They love competition, in all its forms. They are generally quite optimistic, and they love being placed in leadership positions.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-aries.png.strengths: brave, powerful, direct, independent, strong sense of justice, innocent, assertive, fearless, head-strong
astrology-oracle_zodiac-aries.png.title: Aries
astrology-oracle_zodiac-aries.png.weaknesses: aggressive, self-centered, blunt, pushy, inconsistent, selfish, loud, domineering, bad-tempered

astrology-oracle_zodiac-cancer.png.description: Those born under the zodiac sign Cancer love to be needed. They have an great desire to feel loved and appreciated in every part of their lives. This is needed so that they can develop a sense of security and identity. To the Cancer zodiac sign, their sense of home is very important to their feeling of safety and comfort. They find it rather difficult to achieve unless they feel safe in their home. They are talented at developing home environments for people that are close to them - in both an emotional and physical sense.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-cancer.png.strengths: Nurturing, Supportive, Healing, Compassionate, Unconditionally Loving
astrology-oracle_zodiac-cancer.png.title: Cancer
astrology-oracle_zodiac-cancer.png.weaknesses: Dependent, Indirect, Moody, Passive Aggressive, Unable To Let Go

astrology-oracle_zodiac-capricorn.png.description: Those born under the Capricorn zodiac sign are talented at applying their keen intelligence and ambition to practical matters.  Stability and order are important to them - and this makes them good organizers. Their goals are often lofty, and they achieve them slowly - but purposefully, and systematically. They are gifted with a sharp intuition, although they can be rather secretive about what they perceive. They are patient with themselves - they have confidence that they can accomplish all their goals if they follow their step-by-step plan. They are responsible people that often take the heavy burden of others - whether willingly, or just because they are so capable. However, they find it difficult to share their own troubles and can struggle with depression if they don't learn how to express their feelings.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-capricorn.png.strengths: driven, patient, strategic, determined, disciplined, reliable, responsible and persistent
astrology-oracle_zodiac-capricorn.png.title: Capricorn
astrology-oracle_zodiac-capricorn.png.weaknesses: pessimistic, greedy, cynical, fearful, ruthless in achieving a goal, rigid, and miserly

astrology-oracle_zodiac-gemini.png.description: Those born under the Gemini zodiac sign enjoy socializing and love surrounding themselves with people. They are ruled by the planet Mercury, and so they are never happier than when they are sharing their ideas and communicating with the people around them. They enjoy chit-chat and tend to have expression and communication very high on their list of priorities. Sometimes their love for sharing themselves with others, and their never-ending list of ideas can make them seem nervous, excited, and sometimes even manic.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-gemini.png.strengths: Intelligent, Adaptable, Agile, Communicative, Informative, Connected
astrology-oracle_zodiac-gemini.png.title: Gemini
astrology-oracle_zodiac-gemini.png.weaknesses: Talkative, Exaggerating, Deceptive, Cunning, Superficial, Inconsistent

astrology-oracle_zodiac-leo.png.description: Leos tend to have almost a royal air about them. Their planetary ruler is the Sun, and so they are talented at bringing warmth, life and light into the relationships that are important to them. Many Leos will have a large group of friends that adore them. They have a kind of natural charisma which often makes other signs gravitate towards them. Like their planetary ruler, Leos love to be at the center of attention and they deeply appreciate compliments and even flattery. Their happy and outgoing attitude towards life makes them pleasurable to be around.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-leo.png.strengths: Brave, Playful, Leader, Fun, Warm, Protective, Generous, Charismatic
astrology-oracle_zodiac-leo.png.title: Leo
astrology-oracle_zodiac-leo.png.weaknesses: Egotistical, Dominating, Stubborn, Controlling, A Show-off, Vain

astrology-oracle_zodiac-libra.png.description: The zodiac sign Libra is thrives when their needs of balance, justice, and stability are met. They are charming creatures that somehow always surround themselves with a sense of beauty and harmony. Admittedly, some of them can go to extremes searching for that harmony - which can make their situations unreasonable or unhealthy. Their ruling planet is Venus meaning that Libras are nurturing, caring, and they can make great defenders of the downtrodden. Sometimes, they can be shy if they find difficulties in coming out of their shell and letting their guard down. Despite their more introverted side they still love a good debate.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-libra.png.strengths: Charming, Harmonious, Diplomatic, Easy-going Nature, Polished
astrology-oracle_zodiac-libra.png.title: Libra
astrology-oracle_zodiac-libra.png.weaknesses: Indecisive, Superficial, Hypocritical, Gullible, Passive Aggressive

astrology-oracle_zodiac-pisces.png.description: The Pisces zodiac sign are the dreamers and mystics of the zodiac - but you may never know it. Many of them have extremely vivid inner lives - filled with fantasy, magic and wonder. They may find it hard to express that inner life, meaning that many of them are introverts. They are honest, compassionate, and trustworthy but they can sometimes take it too far and be rather gullible. Because of that they can be taken advantage of. Beneath their quiet exterior, Pisces has an intense determination, which helps them transcend any obstacles that come their way.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-pisces.png.strengths: mystical, intuitive, imaginative, compassionate, sensitive and romantic
astrology-oracle_zodiac-pisces.png.title: Pisces
astrology-oracle_zodiac-pisces.png.weaknesses: escapist, unrealistic, submissive, lethargic, self-pitying, lacking boundaries, dependent and codependent

astrology-oracle_zodiac-sagittarius.png.description: The Sagittarius zodiac sign often gains the reputation of the philosopher among their fellow zodiac signs. They do have a great ability to focus, but this may be surprising since many of them love exploring and wandering the world, tasting all the pleasures of life. From an early age, they must learn how to channel their energy or else they risk stretching themselves out too thin going in too many directions. They often are hasty individuals and lack patience. When they encounter failure they can sometimes make a sudden comeback, much to the surprise of others. While they are loyal friends, they may find it hard to commit as this can run counter to their desire for freedom and expansion.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-sagittarius.png.strengths: Ambitious, Lucky, Moral, Optimistic, Enthusiastic, Open-minded, Versatile
astrology-oracle_zodiac-sagittarius.png.title: Sagittarius
astrology-oracle_zodiac-sagittarius.png.weaknesses: Gluttonous, Lazy, Restless, Irresponsible, Blindly Optimistic, Tactless

astrology-oracle_zodiac-scorpio.png.description: Unfortunately, those born under the Scorpio zodiac sign are often misunderstood. They are quite bold, with intense personalities and feelings that hide underneath their cool exterior. They are capable people that can complete great and massive projects with control and confidence. Their intensity when approaching a situation means that they can surmount almost all obstacles if they can truly put their mind to the task. Many Scorpios have an unshakable focus when they need to call on it. However, they are often secretive, seeming withdrawn and uninterested, when they are actually keenly observing.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-scorpio.png.strengths: Passionate, Driven, Perceptive, Emotional, Sacrificing, Determined
astrology-oracle_zodiac-scorpio.png.title: Scorpio
astrology-oracle_zodiac-scorpio.png.weaknesses: Vindictive, Paranoid, Destructive, Possessive, Jealous, Clingy

astrology-oracle_zodiac-taurus.png.description: People born under the Taurus zodiac sign are often incredibly dedicated, reliable and dependable. Above all things, they value their sense of security and stability.  After Aries brings its fiery energy, it is Taurus that lays down the foundations and follows through. They tend to be rather stubborn and dislike change. When they settle with a routine that they like, it can take much effort to get them to change.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-taurus.png.strengths: steady, driven, tenacious, patient, enduring, persistent, solid, determined, trustworthy, tasteful
astrology-oracle_zodiac-taurus.png.title: Taurus
astrology-oracle_zodiac-taurus.png.weaknesses: materialistic, resistant to change, fanatical, indulgent, gluttonous, possessive, stubborn, narrow-minded

astrology-oracle_zodiac-virgo.png.description: Those born under the Virgo zodiac sign have capable, organized and analytical minds, which often makes them a pleasure to chat with. Even when they have rather fantastic stories, the charming way they tell them can make those stories convincing. Virgos are curious people, and they have a natural gift for research - whether it comes to assignments, or even people. They also often have great memory and a talent for intuition. They make for excellent team members in both work and social situations. They love to collaborate, although their sometimes critical nature can annoy others when those criticisms are not understood.
astrology-oracle_zodiac-virgo.png.strengths: humble, altruistic, logical, responsible, organized, orderly, modest, devoted
astrology-oracle_zodiac-virgo.png.title: Virgo
astrology-oracle_zodiac-virgo.png.weaknesses: obsessive, critical, excessive attention to insignificant details, perfectionist

19.description: This path is about adapting to change and moving alongside natureâ€™s cycles resourcefully. It is about recognizing and understanding the natural shifts of the universe while using your inner powers of manifestation and creation to harmonize with those cycles gracefully and successfully. The Sun gives an air of contentment, joy and peace to this path, allowing you to enjoy the abundance that life brings you.

10-1.description: Your life path is one of following the cyclic change of the universe and the random hand of fate, while using the manifestation powers and resourcefulness of the Magician to shape the world to your ideals. Wherever the wheel shifts, you will be ready.

11-2.description: Your path unites clarity, fairness and harmony with deep intuitive understanding and knowledge. Justice and the High Priestess are concerned with two different sides in life; the transactional and the spiritual. Your insights tend to go deeply, a powerful compliment to Justiceâ€™s objectivity and sharp decision making.

12-3.description: This life path represents gentle progress found in stillness and delays. Life's movements and lessons of personal growth are found through quiet contemplation and self-love. The willful sacrifices of the Hanged Man are made with the nurturing care of the Empress. Through these principles you are guided to continue your spiritual path.

13-4.description: Death represents the ending of cycles as well as their renewal. It is here in these critical moments where the Emperorâ€™s power, authority and structure are needed in order to create stability and security. For the new cycle to be ushered in, your strong and steady hand will be needed to steer its movement.

14-5.description: Your path is one of the teacher; using your great wisdom to bring calm and peace to conflict. Having these two cards come together is akin to having two great advisors, one bearing the keys to long established knowledge, and the other equipped with the gentle serenity to unify disparate groups.

15-6.description: Deep sensuality is indicated by this birth card pair. The Devil provides passion and carnal desire. There is playfulness and pleasure in the material realm, but also the danger and temptation of addiction. The Lovers bring an element of purity to the Devil's animalistic nature. Your life path is guided combining the earthly and the celestial into one whole.

16-7.description: Yours is the path of restoring balance in the face of violent transformation. During moments of groundbreaking change, your determination and drive guides you through the chaos. The Tower destroys foundations and structure ruthlessly in order to reveal a new path forward, while you are propelled along by the Chariotâ€™s deliberate and careful control of impulses.

17-8.description: This path is one of hope. You make the choice to look at all that life brings you with optimism and good faith, drawing from your reserves of inner strength. Your path one of making the conscious effort to  move away from sorrow and towards regeneration. This comes with the gift great resilience in times of suffering. Hope is the source of your power, while confidence provides you with assurance.

18-9.description: Your path is about finding the clarity in the darkness and finding truth in an uncertain world. The Moon presents us with phantoms, dreams and illusions; all the hidden facets that lie just below the surface. The hermit is the seeker, who uses their inner truth to light the way to finding their personal wisdom.

20-2.description: This path is one of breaking limitations and releasing oneself from established modes of thought to rebuild them anew. You will be guided by your intuition, and it is through learning to trust your inner voice that you will create your most important work.

21-3.description: Your path is one of self-actualization and bringing together all the disparate parts of yourself so you can feel completely at home in this world. You will be guided by love; both giving and receiving love. This nurturing and caring aspect within you will be your compass towards fulfillment, and is the gift you give to all others.

slides.data:
Normally when you tap a card, you'll get the card's generic meanings. You'll have to use your own skills to apply them to your situation.

Our computer models can also do that work for you. Each reading will cost 10 credits per card. A three card reading will cost 30 credits, a 10 card reading will cost 100.

Never again feel stumped about what the cards can mean for you.

Your readings remain confidential and private. Our readers offer interpretations starting at around 30 cents per card. Our machine-learning models will never replace the human touch of a real life reader, but sometimes itâ€™s comforting to have easy access to a quick, non-judgmental machine.
slides.title: About Our Personalized Readings

slides.data:
Digital readings, physical readings and free-form readings can all access machine readings. After you draw every card in any reading, you'll have access to Catssandra and her friends. Tap on her icon to explore all the readers we have available, and ask your question.

You can swipe on Catssandra or tap the arrow icons to meet all our readers. Each one has different personalities, strengths and weaknesses. (As a fun fact, each and every one of them are also puns based on famous occultists in history!)
slides.title: Getting an Interpretation

slides.data:
It will take 15-60 seconds for one of our readers to produce your report, but once it is done, each interpretation is automatically saved to your journal.

You'll get a card by card report and how each one relates to your question, as well as a summary of your reading. You can export this reading as a PDF to share with anyone you'd like. In order to generate PDF readings, we'll need permission to store them on your phone first.
slides.title: Exploring Your Report

slides.data:
You can access saved readings in your journal. When you tap on a saved reading, you'll see the card layout and have access to your personal notes, as well as past AI interpretations.

If you require additional support for any of your readings, you can seek advice from another reader here. However, there are some limitations: you can only receive one interpretation from each reader per question. If you're not on the premium plan, you will be charged again.
slides.title: Accessing Past Readings

slides.data:
• Catssandra is our first AI model, and based off our Headmistress' personality. She is a softie and provides gentle readings.
  • Crowley can give you the harsh reality check you need.
  • Nostradamouse is a silly little guy that gives you your reading in poetry, bringing some levity to a serious situation.
  • Owlcle provides reflections for you to consider. Think of how a therapist may ask you things to help guide you to answers instead of telling you what to do.
slides.title: Meet Our Readers

slides.data: Some combinations of reader insights are especially helpful. Owlcle for example, provides you with more questions to think about and reflect on. You may find her particularly useful after using Crowley or Catssandra to help you understand what the cards mean for you.
slides.title: Using Readers Together

amethyst.description: Amethyst is believed to offer protection, clear negativity, and promote balance and well-being. Its calming influence is said to make it a wonderful healing crystal for anxiety. It is also known for its reputed ability to connect the concrete with the spiritual. it also symbolizes spiritual healing, calmness, and wisdom.
amethyst.title: Amethyst

blueLaceAgate.description: Blue Lace Agate is a soothing and nurturing stone known for its calming energy, which helps to alleviate stress and anxiety. Its gentle blue hues are believed to enhance communication, encouraging clarity of thought and expression. This crystal is often used to promote peace of mind and emotional healing, making it an ideal companion for those seeking tranquility in their lives.
blueLaceAgate.title: Blue Lace Agate

citrine.description: Citrine, often referred to as the "Merchant's Stone," is celebrated for its vibrant energy and ability to attract wealth and prosperity. This golden-hued crystal is believed to enhance creativity, boost confidence, and promote joy by dispelling negative energies. Known for its powerful manifestation properties, citrine encourages a positive outlook on life and helps in achieving personal goals.
citrine.title: Citrine

fluorite.description: Fluorite is renowned for its ability to enhance mental clarity and focus. This vibrant crystal aids in decision-making by clearing away confusion and negativity, making it an excellent companion for those seeking intellectual growth and emotional stability. Its calming energy also promotes harmony and balance, fostering a sense of peace within one's environment.
fluorite.title: Fluorite

jade.description: Jade is a symbol of serenity and purity, revered for its protective qualities and ability to attract good luck and friendship. This precious stone promotes harmony in relationships, balances emotions, and encourages self-sufficiency. Known as the "dream stone," jade also aids in releasing negative thoughts while soothing the mind.
jade.title: Jade

jasper.description: Red Jasper is a powerful stone that enhances strength, vitality, and stamina in the physical body while promoting self-nurture and emotional healing. Ideal for raising energy and activating spiritual purpose, it helps maintain passion and enthusiasm for life. This stone evokes sexual and creative energies.
jasper.title: Jasper

labradorite.description: Labradorite is renowned for its iridescent play of colors and mystical properties. This captivating crystal is believed to enhance intuition, protect against negative energies, and awaken one's inner spirit. Ideal for those seeking transformation and self-discovery, Labradorite serves as a powerful ally in navigating life's changes with grace and resilience.
labradorite.title: Labradorite

lapis.description: Lapis Lazuli is believed to be a visionary crystal that enhances psychic and intuitive abilities, promoting truth and high moral standpoints. It is often associated with leadership, protection, and opulence, offering strength and balance through its grounding aspect. This stone is also said to connect with dream forces and tap into personal and spiritual power.
lapis.title: Lapis Lazuli

malachite.description: Malachite is believed to be a transformative stone that promotes vitality, health, and conscious decision-making. It is said to heal the heart, build inner strength, and align the heart chakra, fostering emotional balance and positive change. This green copper carbonate mineral is known for its reputed protective qualities, absorbing negative energies and pollutants while offering a "cloak of invisibility" against harmful influences.
malachite.title: Malachite

mossAgate.description: Moss Agate is celebrated for its ability to refresh the soul and enable personal growth. This captivating crystal, with its lush green inclusions resembling moss or foliage, is believed to enhance emotional balance and attract abundance in all forms. It fosters a deep connection with nature, promoting tranquility and stability while encouraging new opportunities and prosperity.
mossAgate.title: Moss Agate

opal.description: Opal is a mesmerizing gemstone known for its vibrant play of colors, symbolizing creativity and inspiration. Often associated with emotional healing, it helps to release inhibitions and enhance self-expression. This captivating stone is believed to bring loyalty, faithfulness, and spontaneity into one's life. Opal's unique energy fosters originality and boosts confidence in personal endeavors.
opal.title: Opal

opalite.description: Opalite, often referred to as the "Stone of Eternity," is a man-made crystal known for its serene and calming energy. It enhances communication on all levels, especially the spiritual, making it an excellent tool for meditation and connecting with higher realms. Opalite also aids in overcoming fatigue and stabilizing mood swings, promoting a sense of inner peace and tranquility.
opalite.title: Opalite

roseQuartz.description: Rose Quartz is believed to be a gentle, loving crystal that promotes emotional healing, self-love, and unconditional acceptance. It is said to bring a soft, feminine energy to any situation, supporting the heart chakra and fostering deep inner healing and self-love. It s often thought to unite individuals with the divine, encouraging a deeper understanding of one's true nature.
roseQuartz.title: Rose Quartz

snowflakeObsidian.description: Snowflake Obsidian is believed to be a grounding stone that connects individuals to the earth and helps balance their mind, body, and aura. It is said to enhance psychic abilities, particularly past life recall, and promote mental clarity and focus. This stone is also thought to purify and strengthen the mind, aiding in the elimination of bad habits and addictions. Many people use to foster a deeper connection with the spirit world and enhance overall well-being.
snowflakeObsidian.title: Snowflake Obsidian

sunstone.description: Sunstone is a vibrant crystal known for its warm, energizing properties that inspire joy and personal power. Often associated with the sun's radiant energy, it helps dispel fears and self-doubt while fostering a sense of abundance and vitality. This stone encourages independence and originality, making it an excellent companion for those seeking to embrace their true potential.
sunstone.title: Sunstone

qa.a: You have a couple of options when using Labyrinthos. If you have your own deck, you can follow along with the app to shuffle your cards, and input the cards you drew into our digital system, and use it as a quick way of accessing meanings and save your readings. With digital readings, you can either let the system draw your cards at random, or you can choose to pick your cards after the deck is digitally shuffled.

Yes! You can ask any specific question or focus on a particular area of your life, such as love, career, or personal growth. The cards will offer insights based on your intention. There is an option for using the shuffling time before a reading to set this intention and ask your question.
qa.q: Can I ask specific questions to the cards?

qa.a: In our philosophy, tarot readings are tools for reflection and insight. The cards provide symbolic guidance to help you explore possibilities, but itâ€™s up to you how to interpret and act on the messages. You control your fate, not the cards.
qa.q: Are the readings I get with Labyrinthos accurate?

qa.a: No prior experience with tarot is needed! The app provides easy-to-understand card meanings and interpretations, making it accessible for beginners and experienced tarot readers alike. If you're new to tarot, and would like to get more guidance, you can also take a look at our quizzes and articles, which will guide you through some of the basics of tarot, in quick, easy to digest ways.
qa.q: What if I'm not familiar with tarot? How much familiarity do I need with tarot in order to use the app?

qa.a: Thereâ€™s no limit! You can perform as many tarot readings as you'd like, whenever you need guidance or insight. There is one caveat to this though - you can't save more than 100 readings on a free account. This helps ensure we can continue to provide our free service for the millions of users that rely on us. BUT you can always export readings as soon as you get them, often to a nice PDF format and save it on your desktop. Just make sure to turn off the auto-save feature when you've reached the max amount of readings.
qa.q: Is there a limit to the amount of readings that I can do?

qa.a: All basic readings are free and unlimited. If you'd like to help us keep our lights on, you can purchase a premium subscription that gives you access to a bunch of new features, most of which are cosmetic or personalized. You'll get all rune decks, some additional in-context readings, unlimited storage, unlimited personalized AI readings, lesson progress reports, and more. You can also purchase some items individually, like guest tarot decks, that we licensed from other artists. That helps fund both us and the artists and publishers we partner with.
qa.q: Is the app free? How much does a reading cost?
